title: Ticket #6315: default interactive submit file has unneeded copy_to_spool statement.
description: The default submit file for interactive jobs has a copy_to_spool statement, with the switch to submit_utils, this statement is now causing a warning from condor_submit that copy_to_spool is an unused macro.
remarks:
2017-Jun-22 11:41:47 by johnkn:
The interactive submit file has both 
transfer_executable=false
copy_to_spool=false

When transfer_executable is false, copy_to_spool is indeed never looked at, so this warning is correct. The fix is to remove copy_to_spool from the default interactive submit file.

2017-Dec-13 13:10:36 by jfrey:
Code Review

These changes look good.
check_ins: 2017-Dec-13 11:19   Check-in [52993]: remove unneeded copy_to_spool statement from default interactive submit file. #6315 ===VersionHistory:Complete=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
